00013 void SpecifyButtonSoundScheme( INT32 iButtonID, INT8 bSoundScheme )
00014 {
00015       ButtonList[ iButtonID ]->ubSoundSchemeID = (UINT8)bSoundScheme;
00016       if( bSoundScheme == BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_GENERIC )
00017       {
00018             #ifdef JA2
00019             switch( guiCurrentScreen )
00020             {
00021                   case MAINMENU_SCREEN:
00022                   case OPTIONS_SCREEN:
00023                   case LOADSAVE_SCREEN:
00024                   case SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN:
00025                   case INIT_SCREEN:
00026                         ButtonList[ iButtonID ]->ubSoundSchemeID = BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_BIGSWITCH3;
00027                         break;
00028 
00029                   case LAPTOP_SCREEN:
00030                         ButtonList[ iButtonID ]->ubSoundSchemeID = BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_COMPUTERBEEP2;
00031                         break;
00032 
00033                   case AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN:
00034                   case MAP_SCREEN:
00035                   case GAME_SCREEN:
00036                   case SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN:
00037                         ButtonList[ iButtonID ]->ubSoundSchemeID = BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_SMALLSWITCH2;
00038                         break;
00039 
00040                   case GAME_INIT_OPTIONS_SCREEN:
00041                         ButtonList[ iButtonID ]->ubSoundSchemeID = BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_VERYSMALLSWITCH2;
00042                         break;
00043 
00044                   //Anything not handled gets NO sound.
00045                   //SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN,
00046                   //GAME_SCREEN,
00047                   //MSG_BOX_SCREEN,
00048                         
00049                   //ERROR_SCREEN,
00050                   //ANIEDIT_SCREEN,
00051                   //PALEDIT_SCREEN,
00052                   //DEBUG_SCREEN,
00053                   //SEX_SCREEN,
00054             }
00055             #endif
00056             if( bSoundScheme == BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_GENERIC )
00057                   bSoundScheme = BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_NONE;
00058       }
00059 }
00060 
00061 void PlayButtonSound( INT32 iButtonID, INT32 iSoundType )
00062 {
00063       if ( ButtonList[ iButtonID ] == NULL )
00064       {
00065             return;
00066       }
00067 
00068       switch( ButtonList[ iButtonID ]->ubSoundSchemeID )
00069       {
00070             case BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_NONE:
00071             case BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_GENERIC:
00072                   break;
00073 
00074 #ifdef JA2
00075 
00076             case BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_VERYSMALLSWITCH1:
00077                   switch( iSoundType )
00078                   {
00079                         case BUTTON_SOUND_CLICKED_ON:
00080                               PlayJA2Sample( VSM_SWITCH1_IN, RATE_11025, 15, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                
00081                               break;
00082                         case BUTTON_SOUND_CLICKED_OFF:
00083                               PlayJA2Sample( VSM_SWITCH1_OUT, RATE_11025, 15, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
00084                               break;
00085                         case BUTTON_SOUND_DISABLED_CLICK:
00086                               PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Sounds\\Disabled Button.wav", RATE_11025, 15, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                 
00087                               break;
00088                   }
00089                   break;
00090             case BUTTON_SOUND_SCHEME_VERYSMALLSWITCH2:
00091                   switch( iSoundType )
00092                   {
00093                         case BUTTON_SOUND_CLICKED_ON:
00094                               PlayJA2Sample( VSM_SWITCH2_IN, RATE_11025, 15, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                
00095                               break;
